_sText:
Hello,

Merry Christmas to all and specially for the frenchs wich support the man named Sarkozy, taht we call between us the plague...

This css_uniccastle, small/medium size hostages map for Css

In this map you will find ruins and towers, you will able to jump on the walls and rocks, climb with ladders on the top of the ruins, take a secret way to surprising your enemies and take  back the hostages.

I recommend to back the hostages not by the lift, but sure you can if you want...

This map is designed espescially to sniping and shooting, but you can ambush or give assault...

I recommend 24 players but you can play more, depends of your configuration, the nav customs points are provide, but as usually the bots and the hostages are not very very cleaver...

Its probably my last map for CSS, because the limitations off the source graphic engine dont ive statisfaction to me...
